cakes.name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
cakes.description: A rich and indulgent chocolate cake with layers of fudge filling.

cakes.name: Red Velvet Cake
cakes.description: A moist and velvety red-colored cake with cream cheese frosting.

cakes.name: Carrot Cake
cakes.description: A flavorful cake made with grated carrots and topped with cream cheese icing.

cakes.name: Vanilla Bean Cake
cakes.description: A classic vanilla cake made with real vanilla beans and buttercream frosting.

cakes.name: Lemon Raspberry Cake
cakes.description: A refreshing cake with lemon-flavored layers and raspberry filling.

cakes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
cakes.description: A delightful cake filled with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

cakes.name: Coconut Cream Cake
cakes.description: A tropical-inspired cake with layers of coconut and creamy frosting.

cakes.name: Black Forest Cake
cakes.description: A classic German cake with layers of chocolate, cherries, and whipped cream.

cakes.name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
cakes.description: A deliciously caramelized cake with pineapple rings and cherries.

cakes.name: Banana Nut Cake
cakes.description: A moist-nutty cake made with ripe bananas and topped with cream cheese frosting.

cakes.name: German Chocolate Cake
cakes.description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey coconut-pecan filling.

cakes.name: Mango Mousse Cake
cakes.description: A light and airy cake with layers of mango mousse and a sponge base.
